## About The nerdy dude in the group, an artist in his solitude. Yeah you guessed it right! The art you just saw above is one of my creations. A young and ambitious lad from the city of Bhubaneswar, I choose to remain quiet and calm most of the time. Sometimes you can see a lazy sloth sleeping all the day in his uncomfortable bed, procrastinating. Oh, that's me! I rejoice making my mental repository more diverse and informative. I currently am a Software Developer in the Private Banking and Assets Management team at Societe Generale. A fresh graduate from the department of Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering in Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. I am a believer in power of open source to change the world and am an active developer for Apertium, coala and gitmate organisations. In the past, I have been a mentor for coala organisation in Google Code-in, 2017 edition and student for Apertium organisation in Google Summer of Code, 2018 edition. Got some free time? Scroll down to read more!!! Believe me, I won't bore you for a moment. To see what I am upto, follow my github handler Techievena!!!!
